p: The FIC indices in combination with A. annua EO and hymexazol or flutriafol were given in Table 3. According to the FICI values, the combined use of A. annua EO and flutriafol shows additive (0.75) inhibitory effect on F. solani, while the effects on F. oxysporum is irrelevant (1.25). At the same time, the results reveal the additive effect (0.63) on inhibiting F. oxysporum and synergistic (0.38) effect on inhibiting F. solani, when A. annua EO combined with hymexazol.
